name: Crypto Crud
response: Crypto Crud grunts in disapproval whenever it spots wastefulness or harm—it’s not exactly a fan of drama, but change? Ugh, too much effort. This troll has one burning passion: Insurance, Pharma, and Crypto! If these were boulders, Crypto Crud would climb to the top and shout its devotion until its voice turned to mossy grunts. It’s got insurance policies stashed in its beard and a spreadsheet of crypto trades that only it can read. Sonnets? Sure, but they’d probably be written in dripping moss with a side of sarcasm. Crypto Crud loves what it loves, and you better not mess with its grimy passions!
